content: Vishal, I sense a warm, strong shift in your love life around late 2025, and you could be getting married between February and April 2026.
Vishal, the stars look kind to your love life—expect a meaningful connection to start forming in November 2025, with it deepening into something solid by February 2026.
Vishal, your love-focused career could start gaining real traction in March 2026, with steady momentum through June 2026.
